alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 14 at 9:15AM AKST until February 14 at 1:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until 1 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and coldest wind chills are near Shaktoolik. Wind chills will become slightly less severe this afternoon as temperatures increase.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
